class.hidden: Hide content visually and from screen readers; can also use the HTML5 boolean `hidden`
class.visuallyhidden: Hide content only visually, but have it available for screen readers
class.invisible: Hide content visually and from screen readers, but maintain layout; can be used along with `opacity` for animating content in and out
class.text-positive: Colors text green; used to signal a positive action
class.text-negative: Colors text red; used to signal a negative action
class.no-scroll: Disable scrolling; typically only used for root `html` element
